text: so what Mika this is the short summary
of tie up your burger and today we're
making a lap burger for the full version
the link is just right below let's get
started for the patty we've got some
ground beef lemongrass galangal kaffir
lime leaves shallots toasted rice powder
fish sauce and egg chilli flakes and
lime juice mix it all up and just make
them into patties you can grill the
burger if it's a nice day like I did or
you can just fry them up on the skillet
for the slaw
we've got shredded cabbage cilantro
green onions lots of mint more toasted
rice powder more chili flakes lime juice
and fish sauce just toss it all up now
let's build the burger toast your buns
please come taste better that way and
then put some original Thai Sierra cha
sauce on it some avocado the patty red
onions tomatoes and our awesome slaw and
you just go for it and that is it it's
so easy summer is coming so try it out
of your next barbecue and I promise you
will love it for the full recipe with
all the details you can click right here
or in the link below if you enjoy the
show please click to subscribe and I
will see you next time
Top Khun kha
